note.p: Education: Tiverton School; Sidney Sussex College, Cambridge; BA (1650), MA (1653); Caius College, Cambridge; MD (1655)

Career: Fellow of Sidney (1651-1655); Fellow of Caius (1655-1701); Hebrew Lecturer (1655); Greek Lecturer (1664); practised at Exeter, Devon; his mind failed and he spent his final years with relatives in Somerset
References: Guy Meynell, 'Locke, Boyle and Peter Stahl' in NR 1995 vol 49 pp 185-192
